SELECT count(1) FROM tb_goods WHERE start_time < SYSDATE() and SYSDATE() < end_time
AND ( name LIKE #{keyword} OR title LIKE #{keyword} OR goods_desc LIKE #{keyword} )
and EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tb_goods a, tb_goods_sku b WHERE a.goods_id = b.goods_id AND b.state = 1 )

SELECT a.goods_id, a.name, a.title, a.user_id, a.goods_desc, a.start_time, a.end_time, b.sku_id, b.goods_id, b.sku_params, b.price, b.picture, b.sku_reserve, b.sku_start_reserve, b.state, b.version FROM tb_goods a, tb_goods_sku b WHERE a.goods_id = b.goods_id AND b.state = 1

SELECT a.goods_id, a.name, a.title, a.user_id, a.goods_desc, a.start_time, a.end_time, b.sku_id, b.goods_id, b.sku_params, b.price, b.picture, b.sku_reserve, b.sku_start_reserve, b.state, b.version FROM tb_goods a, tb_goods_sku b WHERE a.goods_id = #{id} AND a.goods_id = b.goods_id AND b.state = 1
